bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank1 = [
    '全部',
    '推荐',
    '热门',
    '上架'
];
orderby1 = [
    'manga',
    'hots',
    'dayup',
    'newss'
];
for (i in rank1) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby1[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank1[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  地　　区  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank2 = [
    '韩漫',
    '国漫',
    '日漫',
    '欧美',
    '其他'
];
orderby2 = [
    'kr',
    'cn',
    'jp',
    'ou-mei',
    'qita',
];
for (i in rank2) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-genre/${orderby2[i]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank2[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '复仇','古风','奇幻','逆袭','异能','宅向','穿越','热血',
    '纯爱','系统','重生','冒险','灵异','大女主','剧情','恋爱',
    '玄幻','女神','科幻','魔幻','推理','猎奇','治愈','都市',
    '异形','青春','末日','悬疑','修仙','战斗'
];
link = [
    'fuchou','gufeng','qihuan','nixi','yineng','zhaixiang','chuanyue','rexue',
    'chunai','xitong','zhongsheng','maoxian','lingyi','danvzhu','juqing','lianai',
    'xuanhuan','nvshen','kehuan','mohuan','tuili','lieqi','zhiyu','doushi',
    'yixing','qingchun','mori','xuanyi','xiuxian','zhandou'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/manga-tag/${link[j]}/page/{{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 更　　 新　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "  ①G站✈️  ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: "  ②G站✈️ ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "  ③G站✈️  ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: "  ④G站🐰  ", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: "  ⑤G站🐰 ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: "  ⑥G站🐰  ", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },
  { name: "  ⑦G站⑦   ", type: "button", action: "$(7)" },
  { name: "  ⑧G站⑧   ", type: "button", action: "$(8)" },
  { name: "  ⑨G站⑨   ", type: "button", action: "$(9)" },
  { name: "  ⑩G站⑩   ", type: "button", action: "$(10)" },
  { name: "  ⑪G站⑪   ", type: "button", action: "$(11)" },
  { name: "  ⑫G站⑫   ", type: "button", action: "$(12)" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; var Option1 = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers, "webView": true }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => String(J.select(element).attr('src')); url = baseUrl.replace(/\/manga\//g, '/chapterlist/'); if(!$2('.chapteritem span.0')){ Url = baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option1); url = baseUrl.replace(/\/manga\//g, '/chapterlist/') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option1); java.setContent(java.ajax(Url)); } s = '★ ' + $2('.flex.flex-row.space-x-1.justify-center.pt-unit-md span').replace(/\/.*/g, '') + ',' + '♥ ' + $2('.flex.flex-row.space-x-1.justify-center.pt-unit-md span').replace(/.*\(/g, '').replace(/人.*/g, '') + ',' + $2('.mb-2.text-xl span').replace(/[中已]/g, ''); k = $2('.text-sm.py-1 a').replace(/\s\,\s/g, ',') + $2('.text-xs.font-medium.mr-2.py-1.rounded-lg.bg-default-200.text-default-800').replace(/#/g, ','); t = $2('.chapteritem span.1').replace(/\s/, '-').replace(/Jan/, '1').replace(/Feb/, '2').replace(/Mar/, '3').replace(/Apr/, '4').replace(/May/, '5').replace(/June/, '6').replace(/July/, '7').replace(/Aug/, '8').replace(/Sept/, '9').replace(/Oct/, '10').replace(/Nov/, '11').replace(/Dec/, '12'); l = $2('.chapteritem span.0'); l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('.text-xs.line-clamp-1.2'), 'author': $2('.text-small.py-1.pb-2 a').replace(/\s\,\s/g, '/'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + '
' + $2('.text-medium.line-clamp-4.my-unit-md').replace(/\\n/g, '
').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': $3('.object-cover').replace(/.*url=/, '').replace(/&.*/, '').replace(/%3A/g, ':').replace(/%2F/g, '/'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

'); } } String(data).replace(/>,/g, '>'); } else { '

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.pb-2');
    for (i in list) {
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.cardtitle').text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': String(list[i].select('img').attr('src')).replace(/.*url=/, '').replace(/&.*/, '').replace(/%3A/g, ':').replace(/%2F/g, '/'),
            'url': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page\/(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page/' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.pb-2')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.pb-2');

        data.push({
            'name': list[i].select('.cardtitle').text(),
            'author': '',
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': String(list[i].select('img').attr('src')).replace(/.*url=/, '').replace(/&.*/, '').replace(/%3A/g, ':').replace(/%2F/g, '/'),

} else {

}

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var Option1 = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers,
    "webView": true
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.chapteritem');
    var date = String(list[list.length - 1].select('span')[1].text()).replace(/\s/, '-').replace(/Jan/, '1').replace(/Feb/, '2').replace(/Mar/, '3').replace(/Apr/, '4').replace(/May/, '5').replace(/June/, '6').replace(/July/, '7').replace(/Aug/, '8').replace(/Sept/, '9').replace(/Oct/, '10').replace(/Nov/, '11').replace(/Dec/, '12');
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].select('span')[0].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': baseUrl.includes('webView') ? (list[i].select('a').attr('href') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option1)) : list[i].select('a').attr('href'),
            'time': String(list[i].select('span')[1].text()).replace(/\s/, '-').replace(/Jan/, '1').replace(/Feb/, '2').replace(/Mar/, '3').replace(/Apr/, '4').replace(/May/, '5').replace(/June/, '6').replace(/July/, '7').replace(/Aug/, '8').replace(/Sept/, '9').replace(/Oct/, '10').replace(/Nov/, '11').replace(/Dec/, '12')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(Get('url') + "searchkey", e);
    return Get('url') + '/s/' + e + '?page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
